content: single_crochet in next single_crochet 2 single_crochet * repeat from * 2x 8 6 8 single_crochet 7 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet 3 single_crochet* repeat from * 2x 10 8-10 10 single_crochet finish off leaving a long tail for sewing to body stuff firmly now we will attach the body to head and then the arms to body in the appropriate places of course at this point our little mario is looking a bit naked let s give him some clothes overalls with dark gold work rounds 1-6 of the body instructions switching to blue work rounds 7-10 of body round 11 30 single_crochet 30 finish off leaving a 8 tail try this peice on mario and rotate the tail to the back now we will work the front flap continue as follows join in the 12th single_crochet from where you finished off row 1-3 8 single_crochet chain 1 and turn strap # 1 after ch1 and turn on row 3 work 2 single_crochet chain 1 and turn v 1 2 updated july 31 2011 www woollybytes com ©2007-2011 roxanne wood continue to lengthen the strap for 10 more row finish off leaving a relatively long tail now for the other strap join on opposite side and work 11 row of 2 single_crochet each to mirror the first strap dress mario in the overalls and secure straps in the center of the back buttons for overalls make 2 with gold chain 2 work 6 single_crochet in first chain finish off leaving long tails to firmly secure buttons in appropriate places which you may do now or later hat with red work rounds 1-6 of body 36 7 single_crochet decrease 4 single_crochet* repeat from * 5x more 30 8-9 30 single_crochet 30 finish off leaving a long tail for brim in 11th single_crochet from where you finished off join and work 10 single_crochet chain 1 and turn row 2 10 single_crochet 3 sl 1 8 single_crochet chain 1 and turn 4 8 single_crochet finish off and weave in tail m emblem with cream or white chain 2 and work 6 single_crochet in first chain as before round 2 work 2 single_crochet in each of the 6 in the previous round 12 finish off attach this to the hat in the center front with the black yarn apply the letter m into the circle i used the long tail of the hat to secure the hat to mario but you may not want to in this case weave in the tail with black embroider eyes and moustache as pictured or as you wish i hope that you think this mario is as cute as i do v 1 2 updated july 31 2011 www woollybytes com ©2007-2011 roxanne wood
